channel.title: Navan Badminton Club
channel.description: Welcome to Navan Badminton Club located at Claremont Stadium in Navan, Co. Meath, Ireland. Club nights every Monday and Wednesday during the season which runs from September to April. Club caters for Adults and Juveniles of all standards from beginner to advanced.

item.title: Thursday Badminton Fun!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night from 9pm to 11pm. Open to all skill levels with courts for team games and open play.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Open Night at Claremont Stadium
item.description: Join us this Wednesday for an open night at Claremont Stadium with all courts open and a session for future legends.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Badminton Night Alert!
item.description: Join us for a night of badminton practice and fun at Claremont Stadium. All courts open for all skill levels!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üè∏ Join Us at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
item.description: Join us at Claremont Stadium for a fun-filled evening of badminton. Open courts from 8pm to 11pm, with a special Juvenile Club Night starting at 6:30pm for ages 14+.
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: üéâ Smash into October at Claremont Stadium! üè∏
item.description: Join us on the last day of September at Claremont Stadium for a fun evening of badminton. Open courts and activities for all ages!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium
item.description: Join us tonight from 9pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night. Whether you're new to badminton or need some practice, we'll have you rallying quickly. All 4 courts are open for a fun-filled evening!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)

item.title: Join Us at Claremont Stadium for a New Badminton Season!
item.description: The new badminton season is almost here! Join us at Claremont Stadium for some exciting games. Whether you're a pro or a beginner, there's space for everyone. Don't miss out!
item.author: badminton@navanbadmintonclub.com (Navan Badminton Club)
